sourcing.instructions: - Copper(II) sulfate pentahydrate: Chemical supply stores or online suppliers.
steps: - Copper(II) sulfate pentahydrate: Chemical supply stores or online suppliers.
1. In a clean glass container, measure 50.00 g of copper(II) sulfate pentahydrate and 16.00 g of sodium sulfate.
preparation.raw_text: 1. In a clean glass container, measure 50.00 g of copper(II) sulfate pentahydrate and 16.00 g of sodium sulfate.

steps: 1. Transfer the mixture to a heat-resistant ceramic mold with dimensions of 3 inches x 2 inches x 7 inches.
heating.raw_text: 1. Transfer the mixture to a heat-resistant ceramic mold with dimensions of 3 inches x 2 inches x 7 inches.

steps: 1. After 2 hours, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down naturally to room temperature (approximately 1-2 hours).
cooling.raw_text: 1. After 2 hours, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down naturally to room temperature (approximately 1-2 hours).

steps: 1. Carefully remove the solid sample from the mold once cooled.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Carefully remove the solid sample from the mold once cooled.
